channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Graduate Summer Lunch & Learn-The Art of Scientific Presentations | July 16 (Registration Required)
item.description: Date: Wednesday, July 16, 2025 11:30 AM - 1:00 PM - Dr. Jacob Shelley-In “The Making of a Scientist” (1953), Anne Roe said, “Nothing in science has any value to society if it is not communicated…”. In this presentation, based on a long-running series of seminars and short courses, suggestions will be offered on how to prepare for, present, and benefit from scientific lectures, be they in a classroom environment, technical conference, local seminar, job interview, or short course. Registration…
item.author: Students

item.title: Adirondack Extreme Adventure Course | July 12
item.description: Date: Saturday, July 12, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM - Please visit recwell.rpi.edu or reach out to bradbj@rpi.edu for more information.
item.author: Community

item.title: Walkway Between JEC and The Greene Building Under Construction Beginning Monday, July 14th
item.description: Beginning Monday, July 14, 2025, the elevated walkway between the JEC and Greene buildings will undergo necessary repairs to its west side. Construction is expected to continue through Friday, August 16th. During this period, the walkway will be closed to all pedestrian traffic. Please note that this project will also impact the second-floor entrance into the Greene Building, which serves as the ADA-accessible entry. In coordination with the contractor, a portion of the ramp and walkway will…
item.author: Community

item.title: Fidelity Confidential Consultation (By Phone with Zoom Video Option) | July 14
item.description:
Date: Monday, July 14, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM - Schedule a confidential consultation to help you become better informed and more confident about your workplace retirement savings plan benefits. To schedule an appointment, call 1-800-642-7131, Monday through Friday, 8:00 am to midnight, or online at https://nb.fidelity.com/public/nbpreloginnav/rpi/microsite/#/tem/meet-with-us

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
